communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Under the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request access to records concerning Felipe Calderón Hinojosa, who served as President of Mexico from December 1, 2006, to November 30, 2012. I am specifically interested in:
Any investigations or communications involving Calderón’s strategy in the "War on Drugs," especially records on joint operations, intelligence sharing, and assessments of the U.S. on his administration’s policies.
Records regarding potential human rights violations associated with the military’s role in combating organized crime under Calderón’s tenure.
Intelligence reports or discussions on U.S.-Mexico border security initiatives that were negotiated or conducted during his administration.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Hiroshi Takahashi

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act for records relating to Enrique Peña Nieto, President of Mexico from December 1, 2012, to November 30, 2018. I am seeking documentation on:
Investigations or intelligence gathered on alleged corruption and bribery incidents involving his administration and entities such as Petróleos Mexicanos (Pemex) and Odebrecht.
Records concerning Peña Nieto’s administration's responses to organized crime, specifically any intelligence or joint operations with U.S. agencies related to drug cartels.
Any analysis or communication from U.S. agencies regarding electoral irregularities, foreign influence, or potential election security threats during the 2012 election in which he was elected.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Hiroshi Takahashi

title: Andrés Manuel López Obrador (Central Intelligence Agency)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request access to records concerning investigations, reports, and communications pertaining to Andrés Manuel López Obrador, President of Mexico from December 1, 2018, to September 30, 2024. Specifically, I seek information on:
Any investigations or reports related to the handling of organized crime or drug trafficking operations during his administration.
Records involving foreign intelligence on policies impacting U.S.-Mexico relations, particularly regarding immigration, trade, and energy security.
Any correspondence or memos involving U.S. intelligence agencies and López Obrador’s administration regarding Mexico’s stance on foreign policy, including relations with Cuba and Venezuela.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Hiroshi Takahashi
